page.title: 16CHILDRENS GAMES 2
page.content: {Lollipop.} First walk round in a circle and sing "Lollipop lollipop here we go again." Do that twice. Then you all sit down and the last person to be sitting down goes out. Then the people left in discuss a name of a boy then the other person who was out comes in and he or she stands in the middle and they walk round saying the name of the boy or girl chosen. If she dislikes him she stamps her feet, if she likes him she claps her hands and if she loves him she rolls her hands. Then she joins the circle again and it starts over once more. This game is played by the infants at Chilthorne Domer school.
